Test case to test `/data/events/conversations/:user`

* check an empty conversation list for user A
* insert some edit events as user A
* check that those events do show up for user A's conversation list
* insert some other edit event as user B
* check that the event shows up on A's conversation list
* insert some view events as user B
* make sure that those pages don't show up on the conversation list

* Fixture: SocialRest

This test case assumes a logged in user.

The `before` and `after` clauses work.

| comment        | get a single event, extract it's timestamp |        |
| http-user-pass | %%user_c%%                                 | qwerty |

| get              | /data/events/conversations/%%user_c%%?limit=1 | application/json |
| code-is          | 200            |                  |
| json-parse       |                |                  |
| json-array-size  | 1              |                  |
| set-from-content | first_event_at | qr/"at":"([^"]+)"/ |

| comment | get the second event so we can query "before" that time | |
| get              | /data/events/conversations/%%user_c%%?limit=1;offset=1 | application/json |
| code-is          | 200            |                  |
| json-parse       |                |                  |
| json-array-size  | 1              |                  |
| set-from-content | second_event_at | qr/"at":"([^"]+)"/ |

| code-is         | 200                                                                     |                  |
| json-parse      |                                                                         |                  |
| json-array-size | 1                                                                       |                  |
| body-unlike     | %%first_event_at%%                                                      |                  |
| body-like       | %%second_event_at%%                                                     |                  |

| code-is         | 200                                                             |                  |

| json-array-size | 1                                                               |                  |
| body-like       | %%first_event_at%%                                              |                  |
| body-unlike     | %%second_event_at%%                                             |                  |
